meanings.sent1: The birthings of new life bring joy to families.
meanings.sent2: She experienced difficult birthings but was grateful for her healthy baby.
meanings.sent3: The birthings in the barn were so loud, even the animals were surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her birthings were like a beautiful dance of life and love.
meanings.sent5: The birthings of spring flowers painted the fields with color.

meanings.sent1: The birthings of new animals on the farm were always exciting.

meanings.sent3: The birthings of ideas in his mind led to great inventions.
meanings.sent4: The birthings of stars in the night sky filled her with wonder.
meanings.sent5: The birthings of a new day brought hope to the weary traveler.

meanings.definition: The event of bringing forth offspring
meanings.sent1: The birthings of many puppies made the house lively.
